title: The Female Philosopher - summarizes fifth stanza

content.question: Which of the following statements best summarizes the meaning of the fifth stanza (lines 17-20)?

choices.label: Life is gloomy and onerous, and only love illuminates one’s path to a gratifying peace.
Although life may seem overwhelming, love provides the test that proves one’s strength.
When life seems unduly painful, love can comfort those who are patient.
If life’s tasks become burdensome, they can be balanced by existential comforts.

content.answer: Life is gloomy and onerous, and only love illuminates one’s path to a gratifying peace.

skill.text: Skill 6.B: Identify and explain the function of a metaphor.
